raw_text: Most available Arabic NLP tools and resources model morphology using surface inflectional features and do not mark rationality; this includes thePATB (Maamouri et al, 2004), the Buckwaltermorphological analyzer (BAMA) (Buckwalter, 2004) and tools using them such as the Morphological Analysis and Disambiguation for Arabic (MADA) system (Habash and Rambow, 2005)
